ItemWeapon.name: Blast Fission Gun
ItemWeapon.description: A visionary answer to the quest for the galaxy's strongest personal weapon. The blast fission gun uses lasers to initiate a runaway fission cascade in an isotope rod. For safety's sake the cascading detonation is suspended in a stasis field and then launched at high velocity away from the user before the suspension effect wears off a split second later. Does 30-60 thermal damage.

missText.text: TARGET manages to avoid the effects of the weapon

hitText.text: TARGET is irradiated for VALUE thermal damage
